Vendor

User can onboard new vendors manually or import a complete file containing a list of vendors and their details. Also, edit existing vendor's details in the system for further use.

"Vendor" tab is accessible from the sidebar as a "Masters" submenu item. Click on it to get an in-depth data view of all the vendors.

User can search for the vendor(s) by entering its details in the search field.

Or, User can click on the dropdown icon for advanced search in which options are present as different fields, use those to filter the search.

Click on "Reset" button to reset the form values.

Click on "Search" button to search for the result.

User can find vendors list in the table.

User can edit/delete the particular vendor from the system by clicking on the respective icons present in the "Action" column of the table.

If you have clicked on the delete(trash) icon then it will open the popup for you, where you have to click on "Yes' button if you are sure about deleting. Else, click on the "No" button.

If you have clicked on the edit icon then you can see the details of that particular vendor. Or, you can double click on the row of the table to view/edit particular vendors information.

System then populates a screen where you can see the complete detail of that particular vendor including vendor name, type, category, tax identification number, status, vendor short Code ,region etc.

Also, you can see two horizontal tabs in the details page below the form fields - Vendor Entities and Vendor Contacts.

You can add an entity to the Vendor by clicking on the 'Add Entity' button. A new screen is populated, enter the details of entity to be created.

Click on "Reset" button to reset the fields.

Click on 'Add Entity' button to create a new entity

User can edit/delete the particular entity from the system by clicking on the respective icons present in the "Action" column of the table.

If you have clicked on delete(trash) icon then it will open the popup for you, where you have to click on "Yes' button if you are sure about deleting. Else, click on the "No" button.

If you have clicked on edit icon then you can see the details of that particular entity. Or, you can double click on the row of the table to view/edit particular entities information.

The system will populate the new screen for you, where you can view/edit the existing information.

Click on "Reset" button to reset the edited fields.

Click on "Add Entity" to save the edited fields changes.

Click on "Vendor Contact" tab to view vendor contact information.

You can edit/delete the particular contact from the system by clicking on the respective icons present in the "Action" column of the table.

If you have clicked on delete(trash) icon then it will open the popup for you, where you have to click on "Yes' button if you are sure about deleting. Else, click on the "No" button.

If you have clicked on edit icon then you can see the details of that particular contact. Or, you can double click on the row of the table to view/edit particular contact information.

The system will populate the new screen for you, where you can view/edit the existing information.

Click on "Reset" button to reset the edited fields.

Click on "Add Contact" to save the edited fields changes.

You can also add new vendor by clicking on "New" button present on the top right corner on the main screen.

Fill the following information to add new vendor in the system.

Click on "Reset" button to reset the form.

Click on "Save" button to save the filled details in the system.

Click on "Import" button so that you can import the complete file having required data in one go.

Click on 'Export' button to export the vendor's details in excel sheet.

Below are the input fields used in this screen:

Name of the field Entry Mode Mandatory Comments
Vendor Name Free text with dropdown Yes You have to enter starting three alphabets of the vendor name and it will show you the result based on that. Once you select vendor name it will auto fill some fields like Vendor Type, Vendor Category, Tax Identification number, Vendor Short Code, Status and also open Vendor Entity and contact forms. You have to fill that too.
Vendor Type Selection Yes System generated once you select vendor name. Also, you can fill it yourself. Type could have following values - Financial Institution, Corporated, Lounge Programs.
Vendor Category Selection Yes System generated once you select vendor name. Also, you can fill it yourself. Category could have following values - Global,Local and Regional.
Tax Identification No Free text Yes System generated once you select vendor name. Also, you can fill it yourself.
Status Selection Yes System generated once you select vendor name. Also, you can fill it yourself. Status could have following values - Active, Inactive
Vendor Short Code Free text Yes System generated once you select vendor name. Also, you can fill it yourself. Code should be in captial letters always.
Region Selection No Region could have following values - North America, South America, Europe, Middle East, Asia Pacific.
ERP Accounting Code Free text No You can enter ERP accounting code for the vendor.
Uploaded Logo Choose File Yes Vendor can upload logo .
Vendor Entity Name Free text Yes Enter vendor's entity name.
Vendor Tin Free text Yes Enter the Tin number for vendor entity's verification.
Vendor Entity Category Selection Yes Category could have following values - Global,Local and Regional.
Address Line 1 Free text Yes Enter the address of the vendor's entity.
Address Line 2 Free text No Enter the address of the vendor's entity.
Postal Code Number Yes Enter the area code of the vendor's entity address.
State Free text Yes Enter the state to which the vendor's entity address belongs to.
City Free text Yes Enter the city to which the vendor's entity address belongs to.
Country Selection Yes Zone could have following values - United States of America, Hong Kong.
Vendor Short Code Free text Yes User should enter a short code that can be used to identify the vendor. It should be in captial letter always.
Alliance Program Selection No Alliance Program could have following values - Star Alliance, One World, Skyteam.
Contact Name Free Text Yes Enter the name of the person to whom we have to contact.
Contact Designation Free text Yes Enter the designation of the contacted person.
Contact No Number Yes Enter the phone number of the person whom we have to contact.
Contact Email Email Yes Enter the email id of the person whom we have to contact.
Vendor Entity Free text Yes You have to enter starting three alphabets of the vendor entity and it will show you the result based on that.
Contact Role Selection Yes Contact Role could have following values - Partner, Plaza.
